How to unlock Investigate the Suspicious Toys

Investigate Arfur Mansion's basement.

Investigate the Suspicious Toys Rewards

Gold. The passphrase to Felogyr's Fireworks. You will have more opportunity to investigate Lord Gortash and Banite cultists.
